title: Bans the use of textbooks containing superfluous commercial advertisements
summary: Provides that, on and after July 1, 2014, no board of education shall approve the purchase or use of textbooks containing commercial brand names, products or company logos unless a specific finding is made by the board, in writing, that the mention of such brand names, products or logos was necessary to achieve an educational purpose.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to banning the use of commercially biased textbooks by school districts
